attributes.action: be more accountable for projects, which are run by the government, taking the approach to government as if it was a corporate structure so that any failure on projects MPs and any others involved would be removed from that position and replaced by another elected MP.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is a result of the number of projects which the government run and have exceeded budget and have over run the deadline.  The government does not see itself accountable to any one (which they should be more accountable to the electorate) so any failure in projects such as the NHS IT project will result in the removal of office for the MPs involved.
